resources.string: Scan this code to share your contact information with your friends. Or Scan your friends QRCode with scan button.
Effortlessly share your contact information with a simple QR code scan. Instantly connect and save profiles to your phoneâ€™s contacts, complete with pictures and bios.
Simplify the way you connect with people. Use QR codes to quickly exchange contact details, including names, phone numbers, emails, and profile pictures. Perfect for business or social gatherings.
Adding new contacts has never been easier. Scan QR codes to instantly save detailed contact information, ensuring you never lose a connection.
This is your name that displayed to your contacts.
Do you want to delete contact ?
If you want to use camera to set a profile picture, please grant permission from app settings.

We require access to your phone number, telephone details, and an image (also your name and biography, although these may be considered less critical). All information, except for the image, is stored locally in the phone\'s cache. This ensures that your personal data, such as your phone number and other details, remain accessible for quicker retrieval without requiring external storage or network access. However, the image is handled separately and may be stored differently to optimize app performance and user experience.
If you want to use the app, you should accept privacy policy.
Click to share link or save qr code !
